resources.string: Welcome to DigiView! This app allows you to display the video feed of your DJI FPV Goggles V1 & V2 on your phone.
3.) Connect goggles and phone using an USB cable
You might need to disable "automatic temp control" on your Air Unit/Vista. (in goggle menu: Settings > Device)
You may need to activate USB OTG in your Android settings.
